Articles.Content:
Hey folks, I'm sure I'm not the only one who's had this problem, so I'm wondering how you've fixed it, if a fix is even possible.

Let's say you have a ship orbiting the mun, or in my case, Jool. You speed up the time warp on a completely different ship to the max setting, and viola! The ship you worked so hard to get into Joolar orbit has now flung itself at the sun.

Are there any fixes for this?

And because I don't like starting two new posts at once, does anyone have a low memory usage on screen protractor to recommend?
This has happened to me, too. No idea what to do about it though.
This also happened to me once while orbiting Minmus, it's very weird.
Gradually step up/step down the warp multiplier, instead of jumping directly from minimum to maximum or vice versa.
